channel.title: Reading Java Files
channel.description: This might be in the wrong section but how do I read java files such as client.java to edit them? I change them to notepad or word document and there just kinda random things... I change it back to a java file after I'm done so the client can work.. Can someone help me?

item.title: Reading Java Files
item.dc:creator: @XxNickxX XxNickxX
item.description:

This might be in the wrong section but how do I read java files such as client.java to edit them? I change them to notepad or word document and there just kinda random things… I change it back to a java file after I’m done so the client can work… Can someone help me?
